modals.addedToBond: This amount of {{unit}} will be added to your current bonded funds.
modals.allowToJoin: Allow new members to join the pool.
modals.becomeNominatorSubtitle: Have full control over who you nominate.
modals.beingDestroyed: This pool is being destroyed. There are no management options available.
modals.bondingWithdraw: Bonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.braveText: To Brave users! Due to a recent update (Brave version 1.36), there may appear issues while using light clients (e.g. not connected).
modals.changeNomination: Once submitted, your nominations will be removed from your dashboard immediately, and will not be nominated from the start of the next era.
modals.claimReward1: Once submitted, your rewards will be bonded back into the pool.You own these additional bonded funds and will be able to withdraw them at any time.
modals.claimReward2: Withdrawing rewards will immediately transfer them to your account as free balance.
modals.controllerImported: You must have your controller account imported to unbond.
modals.destroyPoolResult: Once you Destroy the pool, all members can be permissionlessly unbonded, and the pool can never be reopened.
modals.fastUnstakeCurrentQueue: Number of accounts currently in the fast unstake queue
modals.fastUnstakeExposedAgo_one: You were last exposed {{count}} Era Ago
modals.fastUnstakeExposedAgo_other: You were last exposed {{count}} Eras Ago
modals.fastUnstakeNote1: To register for fast unstake, you must not be actively staking for more than {{bondDuration}} eras.
modals.fastUnstakeNote2_one: If you are inactive for at least {{count}} more Era, you will be able to register for fast unstake.
modals.fastUnstakeNote2_other: If you are inactive for at least {{count}} more Eras, you will be able to register for fast unstake.
modals.fastUnstakeOnceRegistered: Once registerd you will be waiting in the fast unstake queue.
modals.fastUnstakeUnorderedNote: The fast unstake queue is unordered, so the exact timing of being selected is not known.
modals.fastUnstakeWarningUnlocksActiveMore: No unlocks can be active to register for fast unstake. Rebond or withdraw your unlocks to become fully bonded and try registering for fast unstake again.
modals.feedbackPage: We host a feedback page on
modals.lockPoolResult: Once you lock the pool no one else can join the pool.
modals.mustHaveController: You must have your controller account imported to start nominating
modals.mustHaveControllerUpdate: You must have your controller account imported to update your reward destination
modals.noEnough: You do not have enough free balance to register for fast unstake. Fast unstake requires a deposit of
modals.noFreeToBond: You have no free {{unit}} to bond.
modals.noNominatorRole: You do not have a nominator role in any pools.
modals.noRewards: You have no rewards to claim.
modals.notAuthenticated: Not Authenticated. Authenticate and Try Again
modals.notMeetMinimum: You do not meet the minimum nominator bond of {{minNominatorBondUnit}} {{unit}}. Please bond some funds before nominating.
modals.notePoolDepositorMinBond_depositor: As the pool depositor you must maintain a bond of at least {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.notePoolDepositorMinBond_member: As a pool member you must maintain a bond of at least {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.onceSubmitted: Once submitted, you will start nominating your chosen validators.
modals.onceUnbonding: Once unbonding, your funds to become available after {{bondDuration}} Eras.
modals.readOnly: Your account is read only, and cannot sign transactions.
modals.rebondUnlock: You can rebond unlocks at any time in this period, or withdraw them to your free balance thereafter.
modals.registerFastUnstake: Registering for fast unstake requires a deposit of
modals.stopJoiningPool: Stop new members from joining the pool.
modals.stopNominatingBefore: Stop nominating before unbonding all funds.
modals.storedOnChain: Your updated name will be stored on-chain as encoded bytes. The update will take effect immediately.
modals.unbondErrorBelowMinimum: Unable to unbond. Your bonded funds are below the minumum of {{bond}} {{unit}}.
modals.unbondToMaintain: Unbond up to the {{minJoinBondUnit}} {{unit}} minimum to maintain your pool membership
modals.unbondToMinimumCreate: Unbond up to the {{minCreateBondUnit}} {{unit}} minimum bond for pool depositors.
modals.unbondingWithdraw: Unbonding will also withdraw your outstanding rewards of
modals.unlockChunk: Unlock chunks cannot currently be rebonded in a pool. If you wish to rebond, withdraw the unlock chunk first and re-bond the funds.
modals.unlockPoolResult: Once you Unlock the pool new people can join the pool
modals.updateName: Update the public name of the pool.
modals.welcomeToReport: Bug reports, feature requests and improvements are all welcome.
modals.willSurpass: Adding this many favorites will surpass {{maxNominations}} nominations.
modals.youMust_account: You must have your account imported to stop nominating.
modals.youMust_controller: You must have your controller account imported to stop nominating.
